attributes.action: Albion Gardens needs CCTV local council please supply and support
attributes.additional_details: The Albion Gardens Residents have witnessed an increase in anti social behaviour, drug usage, drinking, littering, fly tipping, foxes and sea guls as pests, drug dealing (A class), and despite our best efforts to involve local police and council the response has been the same. No spare police officers and no litter pickers to spare. The answer is to install CCTV to catch offenders and prevent this behviour from continuing. Please sign and help petition the local council to raise this issue to be dealt with.
